channel.title: Budget2022 on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Budget2022 on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Conflicted sentiments: Analysing Budget 2022-23 trends
item.description: Budget 2022-2023 evokes conflicted sentiments. IFF attempts to analyse the highs and lows of the Union Budget, with a special focus on DoT, MeitY and MIB.

item.title: Legislative Brief on Digital Rights for Budget Session 2022
item.description: As the Budget Session of the Parliament commences, we have prepared our third legislative brief on digital rights to highlight some of the focus areas within the larger issues of technology policies and digital rights that call for the extensive deliberation in the houses of the Parliament.
